WorkItem.Description:
If the datagrid is hosted in a scrollviewer and if the scroll viewer does not have Focusable="False" when the current cell is clicked on the scrollviewer receives the focus. This is demonstrated i the attached project.
 
The behaviour that i am expecting is that if i click on the CurrentCell, it stays the CurrentCell.
 
I use the ControlPanel->Ease of Access Center-> Make the keyboard easier to use->Underline keyboard shortcuts and access keys
This enables one to see where the keyboard focus is, as with this setting set there is a dotted line around the currently focused element.
WorkItem.Summary: Datagrid looses focus when clicking on CurrentCell if contained in a ScrollViewer
